original: Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ
paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo
ca nalokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
Nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
